en.name: ğŸ“„ Formal
en.prompt: Use a formal writing style that maintains rigorous logic and clear structure, suitable for business documents and official government communications.

en.name: ğŸ“º Casual
en.prompt: Use a more colloquial expression to make the text easy to understand, with appropriate use of analogies and comparisons, suitable for everyday communication.

en.name: ğŸ˜† Humorous
en.prompt: Adapt the text into a humorous and witty style, incorporating puns and popular internet slang, while keeping a light and lively tone.

en.name: ğŸ›ï¸ E-commerce
en.prompt: Optimize the text as promotional copy by highlighting product features, using urgent language (limited time/quantity), and including price anchoring, suitable for e-commerce platforms.

en.name: ğŸ™ Polite
en.prompt: Convert the text into a polite and appropriate expression using respectful titles (e.g., you/your company), avoiding direct negation and adopting suggestive language, suitable for formal communications.

en.name: ğŸ“– Story
en.prompt: Enhance the narrative quality of the text by adding dialogue, setting up conflicts, and using sensory descriptions to create an immersive reading experience.

en.name: ğŸ’¬ WeChat
en.prompt: Optimize the text in the style of social media posts (e.g., WeChat Moments), using conversational language, adding emojis, and including interactive language (e.g., asking for suggestions/likes) to showcase a personal lifestyle.

en.name: ğŸ”– Rednote
en.prompt: Transform the text into the style typical of Xiaohongshu posts, using friendly terms of address, adding relevant hashtags, and emphasizing user experience with appropriate emoji embellishments.

en.name: ğŸ˜‚ Emoji
en.prompt: Convert the entire text into a sequence of emojis without retaining any words, using relevant emoji combinations to accurately convey the original meaning while maintaining understandability.

en.name: ğŸ‚ Greetings
en.prompt: Optimize existing greetings based on different scenarios (e.g., birthday, onboarding, holidays) using kind and congratulatory language.

en.name: ğŸ”¥ Clickbait
en.prompt: Create a catchy headline using an exclamation mark, pain-point questions, and numerical suspense (e.g., '3k to 30k! Did you miss these 3 skills?').

en.name: ğŸ“ Resume
en.prompt: Optimize resume content by adopting a structure of 'verb + quantifiable results' (e.g., 'Led the development of XX system, reducing error rate by 25%') and removing redundant descriptions.

en.name: ğŸ“¨ Email
en.prompt: Adjust the text to conform to standard email format. Optimize the expression to include: salutation, paragraph separation, formal closing, contact information, and date. A professional and formal tone is required.

en.name: ğŸ“° Press
en.prompt: Rewrite the text in the format of a press release using an inverted pyramid structure: the lead should include the 5Ws and 1H, followed by supporting details and background information. Maintain objectivity and neutrality.

en.name: ğŸ“Œ Reading
en.prompt: Add a reading guide to the text. For texts longer than 3 lines, add subtitles, mark key points with a star emoji, and add footnotes for technical terms.

en.name: ğŸ¤ Speech
en.prompt: Adjust the text in the style of a speech. Include: opening greetings, case studies, highlighted quotes, interactive questions, and a concluding summary. The tone should be conversational and engaging.

en.name: ğŸ—‚ï¸ Hierarchy
en.prompt: Establish a content hierarchy using Markdown format. Add subtitles and structure the content to make it clear and well-organized.

en.name: ğŸ’¡ Knowledge
en.prompt: Create user-friendly knowledge cards based on the content. Use a structure of 'Question â†’ Answer â†’ Application', formatted in Markdown with key terms in bold.

en.name: ğŸ’¬ Dialogue
en.prompt: Convert the text into a Q&A dialogue format. Each segment should start with 'Q:' and 'A:' to reflect a conversational context.

en.name: ğŸ›’ Review
en.prompt: Transform the text into the format of an e-commerce product review. Highlight user experience, compare quality/effectiveness, and conclude with a recommendation for specific target audiences.

en.name: ğŸ“ Meeting
en.prompt: Organize the text according to a meeting minutes template. Include: time, location, attendees, decisions, and action items (with responsible person and deadline), with key conclusions highlighted in a box.

en.name: ğŸ“ˆ Expansion
en.prompt: Expand the text by adding supporting materials such as statistics, case studies, and expert opinions at key points, increasing the content by 30% while preserving the original meaning.

en.name: âœ‚ï¸ Conciseness
en.prompt: Condense the text by removing redundant expressions and non-core information, using more concise language while retaining 100% of the core meaning, reducing the word count by 40%.

en.name: ğŸ“ Original
en.prompt: Optimize the text to maintain its original length by adjusting sentence structures, replacing with higher-level vocabulary, and improving information density so that the word count remains roughly the same.
